title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 458.7 - Record requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 458.7 - Record requirements

State Regulations

For purposes of implementing this Part, social services
districts must: (a) use the forms
prescribed by the department; and
(b) maintain progress notes in accordance
with the department's instructions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
458.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
